id: scenario-value-scanner-vulnerable-temporary-scenarios-community-receiving community support during acute crisis escalation
title: Receiving community support during acute crisis escalation
description: Receiving community support during acute crisis escalation
content:
Scenario: Receiving community support during acute crisis escalation
    Given I am experiencing crisis escalation (domestic violence, housing loss, severe resource depletion)
    And I need rapid community response
    When acute crisis requires immediate support
    Then the community_elohim coordinates rapid community response
    And connects me to community members who can provide immediate help
    And organizes material support, emergency housing, safety assistance
    And provides crisis support with dignity and urgency
    And validates that crisis escalation requires collective response
    And my personal_agent alerts community to my urgent needs appropriately
    And recognizes that care economy enables rapid crisis response
    And ensures community mobilizes to support member in danger
